Data Fields
SPI_DMAChanCfg_t Struct Reference
SPI Driver External Data Structures

SPI DMA channel config. More...

#include <drivers/spi/SPI.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t txDmaChanNum
 
uint32_t rxDmaChanNum
 

Detailed Description

SPI DMA channel config.

When DMA is enabled, system DMA channel number need to be provided per transfer group. In SPI slave mode, only one transfer group is used, one pair of DMA channel number(TX and RX) need to configurred. In SPI master mode, DMA channel should be provided per slave profile.

Field Documentation

uint32_t SPI_DMAChanCfg_t::rxDmaChanNum

RX DMA channel number, must be provided by application, refer to DMA driver for possible DMA channels

uint32_t SPI_DMAChanCfg_t::txDmaChanNum

TX DMA Channel number, must be provided by application, refer to DMA driver for possible DMA channels
